summary: This is a preset for the racemenu mod that includes the likeness of Amy Bruni, who was on the long-running SyFy channel reality show "ghost hunters" for many years.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff00ff]This is a preset for the racemenu mod that includes the likeness of Amy Bruni, who was on the long-running SyFy channel reality show
"ghost hunters" for many years.[/color]
 
[color=#ff0000][b]===>REQUIREMENTS<===
SKSE 1.7.2 or above
Latest version of Racemenu[/b]
[b]Dimonized UNP Skinny Body[/b]
[b]The Eyes Of Beauty[/b]
[b]SG Hair Pack 268 Edition (google this mod to find the download location)[/b]
[b]Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC[/b]
 
[b]THE ABOVE MODS ARE REQUIRED FOR THIS TO WORK PROPERLY! MAKE 100% SURE THAT YOU HAVE THE LATEST VERSIONS OF THEM INSTALLED BEFOREHAND![/b]
[/color][color=#00ff00][color=#ff0000] [/color]
[b]===INSTALLATION===[/b]
[b]Step 1. Go into the directory [i]my computer/local disk/program files x86/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets[/i] and copy and paste the file preset Amy Bruni.jslot[/b]
 
[b]Step 2. Boot the game up, go into racemenu by typing "showracemenu" in the console, then click "presets" on the bar in the top right of the screen, and press F9 to load presets (it should be in there) and voila, there you are![/b]
 [/color]
[color=#00ffff][b]===Optional/Recommended===
Sexy Vanilla Female Armor for UNP and SevenBase with BBP
Bracelets By Ezuka
Sexy Swimsuit and bikinis for CBBE
Wedding Rings By Ezuka
FNIS Sexy Walk/FNIS 5.2[/b]
[b]Better Vanilla Hairs - Mesh Replacements[/b][/color]
author: Kutt
